titles.title: A resolution designating the week of August 10 through August 16, 2014, as "National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
7/23/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of August 10 through August 16, 2014, as National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week and expresses support for its goals and ideals.
Encourages the continued support of such clinics so that they may continue to serve as health care workforce development sites for the next generation of primary care providers.
